text: Ezɨ dɨpar kam a rurimɨn nedazim, kamaghɨra God datɨrɨghɨn rurimɨn tuavimɨn ian akura. Rurim, a mɨkarzibar mɨzɨrɨziba agevir puvatɨ. Rurim kamaghɨn ian aka, ia God ko akam akɨra ghaze, ia uan araziba deravɨra da tuisɨghɨva, egh arazir aghuibara gɨn mangɨ, egh gɨn aghumsɨghan kogham. Krais Iesus ovevemɨn ua dɨkafi, ezɨ tuavir kamɨn God ian akurvasi.(3:21) Grighɨn akam vezɨn kamɨn deragha bizir kam mɨgeir puvatɨ.
